reviews.review: Прекрасная игра которая хоть немного, но возвращает в детство)
its very fun and easy to exploit, would recommend

This is old school first person shooter great with friends. Cheap and simple but you will play for hours! This game should have evolved to the scale of GTA into bigger maps and using cars and helicopters etc.

El juego es bueno,tiene buenas variedad de modos como jail,death run,zombie mod o el clasico mix,la movilidad del juego es buena al igual que los graficos pero lo dificil es el "recoil" de las armas,nada que ver con el 1.6 o GO.

Counter-Strike: Source, прекрасное продолжение, Counter-Strike 1.6, с улучшенной графикой, и гимплейной составляющей, но к сожалению, я толком не заметил изменений визуально, но все же это игра запала мне в сердце, ещё с раннего детства, к щястью я не забыл эти прекрасные деньки, с кучей неудач, и мой скромный и краткий обзор, подходит к концу, сама игра понравится не каждому, вас может смутить немного хуже графика, по сравнению с новинками, и плохая детализация, но если ваш вкус к играм немного отличается от остальных, тогда милости прошу, впрочем вопросов и замечаний нет, товар к употреблению, рекомендую.
Un grand classique des jeux multijoueurs.
Fun shooter even in 2019-2020, Community surprisingly still alive, also works on lower tier pc's. Such as dell optiplex.

This is one of the greatest Source games ever. I had thought it was dead, but it still has thousands of active players.
GRAPHICS:
Old, but not bad. 6/10, but 10/10 for the time it came out!
AUDIO:
The voice command box all sounds like they're 16 and had to do it in one take, but aside from rare audio glitches it's pretty nice to hear. 7/10
Gameplay:
Absolutely amazing, unless you're playing on a ridiculously toxic server. 8/10
Replay value:
Since 2012 I've played this game at a friend's house. I suck at it, but over the course of YEARS I just love it. 9.5/10
Concept:
Very fun, if repetitive. But it's still fun to join an old AWPClan server and go ham on them 360 noscopers, unless they go ham on you.
8.5/10
Playerbase:
Aside from a few bad melons, it's mainly a very friendly and memable community. 9/10.
Overall:
8.5/10, this game hasn't exactly aged like fine wine, but it's extremely impressive for a 2004 game. For real, GTA: San Andreas came out the same year, and compare the graphics on the highest settings without mods. You'll get what I mean.
